The secret is very real and very powerful. Although in the movie they kind of blow it out of proportion a bit (so they can make more $$)because they revolve it mostly around material desires. So for all those skeptics out there this shit does open up the doorway to the real deal... however it is not the real deal. It takes a lot of mental and spiritual work. But if you are serious and persistent, you can use this tool or "law" to manifest your wildest dreams. It works great for me. :-)
